channel.title: Whatever happened to the good old servers?
channel.description: Hello everyone, I just came back to playing private servers after quitting for like a year and a 1/2. The thing that I cant figure out is what happened to the servers that had good economy, nice and kinda slow exp rates? like dodian style scapes, where it was actually hard to get good items as a low level and not too easy as a high level. Where di the challenge of private servers go? or do people just care about pking all the time? the problem with pking servers all the time is they all the same, u get evberything right away get 99 everything quick then wut the heck do you do? pk with like 2 other people? thats boring. What I'm saying is someone should bring rs style servers back!!!

item.title: Whatever happened to the good old servers?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

[quote=“nfsu2man, post:16, topic:343409”]So after my long search I finally found decent server. Called EMPS, has been around for 4 years, combat xp rate 45 per hit, over 700 players on at peak times. 562 server I think. I like it![/quote]A 562 server that has been out for 4 years?

Has anyone ever played SomeScape?
It was like a PK-ing server, but most good items weren’t handed to you.
My favorite server of all time.

Read full topic
item.source: Whatever happened to the good old servers?

item.title: Whatever happened to the good old servers?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Some say the end is near.
Some say we’ll see armageddon soon.
I certainly hope we will.
I sure could use a vacation from this

Bullshit three ring circus sideshow of
Freaks

Here in this hopeless fucking hole we call LA
The only way to fix it is to flush it all away.
Any fucking time. Any fucking day.
Learn to swim, I’ll see you down in Arizona bay.

Fret for your figure and
Fret for your latte and
Fret for your lawsuit and
Fret for your hairpiece and
Fret for your prozac and
Fret for your pilot and
Fret for your contract and
Fret for your car.

It’s a
Bullshit three ring circus sideshow of
Freaks

Here in this hopeless fucking hole we call LA
The only way to fix it is to flush it all away.
Any fucking time. Any fucking day.
Learn to swim, I’ll see you down in Arizona bay.

Some say a comet will fall from the sky.
Followed by meteor showers and tidal waves.
Followed by faultlines that cannot sit still.
Followed by millions of dumbfounded dipshits.

Some say the end is near.
Some say we’ll see armageddon soon.
I certainly hope we will cuz
I sure could use a vacation from this

Stupid shit, silly shit, stupid shit…

One great big festering neon distraction,
I’ve a suggestion to keep you all occupied.

Learn to swim.
Learn to swim.
Learn to swim.

Mom is going to fix it all soon,
Mom is coming round to put it back
The way it oughtta be…

Learn to swim.

Fuck L Ron Hubbard and
Fuck all his clones.
Fuck all these gun-toting
Hip gangster wannabes.

Learn to swim.

Fuck retro anything.
Fuck your tattoos.
Fuck all you junkies and
Fuck your short memory.

Learn to swim.

Fuck smiley glad-hands
With hidden agendas.
Fuck these dysfunctional,
Insecure actresses.

Learn to swim.

Cuz I’m praying for rain
And I’m praying for tidal waves
I wanna see the ground give way.
I wanna watch it all go down.
Mom please flush it all away.
I wanna see it go right in and down.
I wanna watch it go right in.
Watch you flush it all away.

Time to bring it down again.
Don’t just call me pessimist.
Try and read between the lines.

I can’t imagine why you wouldn’t
Welcome any change, my friend.

I wanna see it all come down.
Suck it down.
Flush it down.

Listen to this song, AEnima by Tool. Its an epic song ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Whatever happened to the good old servers?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Thing is we shouldn’t evolve till we master the current protocol were working on; whenever something new comes out they post it and everybody rushes for it, then you suddenly see like 5/10 of the Server Status flooded with that protocol.

krackkid:

Delta is what happened.

^ Tru Dat
